::KitKat:

She nodded."That is your choice and I"ll honor it. But what of your 
team? Like I said, it's mearly a precaution. In the event of death. 
It's not like any of us really plan to die." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest frowns, him and the rest of his team following 
KitKat. "Hmm. 
> It sounds interesting, but I don't plan on dying anytime soon. If 
you 
> don't mind, my DNA will remain with me."
>
